name: Wood-Carved Eyes: How May I Help You
description: A pair of genial and clever wood-carved eyes that can be used to assemble an "Aranara Carving."\nIt was modeled after the eyes of the Port Ormos hotel owner's daughter, Sareh. She warmly welcomes every customer and offers candy to the children playing in the hotel. Therefore, Razi suggested, "If the carvings have Sareh's eyes, that would draw children close, right?"
